fields.label: System Architecture
fields.description: Is it a shared-memory, shared-disk, or shared-nothing DBMS? Does it rely on special hardware (e.g., GPU, FPGA)?

fields.label: Data Model
fields.description: What is the primary data model of the DBMS?

fields.label: Storage Model
fields.description: What kind of storage models does the DBMS support (e.g., NSM, DSM)?

fields.label: Query Interface
fields.description: What language or API does the DBMS support for the application to load data and execute queries.

fields.label: Storage Architecture
fields.description: Is the system a disk-oriented or in-memory DBMS? If the latter, does it support larger-than-memory databases?

fields.label: Concurrency Control
fields.description: Does the DBMS support transactions and if so what concurrency control scheme does it use?

fields.label: Isolation Levels
fields.description: What isolation levels does it support? Which one is the default? How does it implement each one?

fields.label: Indexes
fields.description: What kind of indexes does the DBMS support (e.g., primary key, secondary, derived, partial)? What data structures does the DBMS support? What is the default?

fields.label: Foreign Keys
fields.description: Does the system support foreign key constraints?

fields.label: Logging
fields.description: How does the system support data durability? What kind of logging scheme does it use (e.g., physical, logical, physiological)?

fields.label: Checkpoints
fields.description: How does the DBMS take checkpoints? What kind of checkpoints are they (e.g., fuzzy vs. non-fuzzy)?

fields.label: Views
fields.description: Does the DBMS support views or materialized views? How complex of a query does it support?

fields.label: Query Execution
fields.description: What query processing model does the DBMS support (e.g., iterator vs. vectorized)? What kind of intra-query parallelism does it support?

fields.label: Stored Procedures
fields.description: Does the DBMS support stored procedures? If so, what language(s) can they be written in?

fields.label: Joins
fields.description: What join algorithms does the DBMS support? What is notable or special about them (e.g., low-memory, parallelism)?

fields.label: Query Compilation
fields.description: Does the DBMS support code generation or JIT optimizations? How does it do this (e.g., LLVM, templates, code gen)?
